title: CLDF dataset derived from Heggarty et al.'s "Language Trees of Indo-European Languages" from 2023
citation: Heggarty, Paul, Cormac Anderson, Matthew Scarborough, Benedict King, Remco Bouckaert, Lechosław Jocz, Martin Joachim Kümmel, et al. (2023). "Language Trees with Sampled Ancestors Support a Hybrid Model for the Origin of Indo-European Languages." Science 381 (6656). https://doi.org/10.1126/science.abg0818.
